fxInfo_clarification: These are ordinalized versions of the V-Dem women political participation index. The original index ranges from 0 to 1. These transformations offer three different ordinal versions with three (_3C), four (_4C), and five (_5C) levels respectively.
fxInfo_question: Are women descriptively represented in formal political positions?
name: e_v2x_genpp_3C /_4C /_5C
